Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Transfiguration:

Text.Language: ?liac nem Mwu~c/c petjor: aunau e~nefh~bwc hi Yabwr: nimay/t/c auerjinior: n~ou[/pi ecerouwini.
Elijah and Moses the strong: saw His clothes on Tabor: the disciples passed: through a bright cloud.
ايليا وموسى نظرا القوي ثيابه فوق طابور وعبر التلاميذ سحابة نيرة.

Comment.Language: Another response for the Feast of the Transfiguration:

Text.Language: <ere piswbt n~te Pi,~rictoc: hijen pitwou n~Yabwr: nahren nefmay/t/c eyouab: Petroc nem Iwann/c nem Iakwboc.
Hail to the transfiguration of Christ: on Mount Tabor: before His holy disciples: Peter and John and James
السلام لتجلي المسيح على جبل طابور امام تلاميذه القديسين بطرس ويوحنا ويعقوب.
